item.title:
3 obstacles for a piece of content to have an impact on people. 1. Production 2. Dissemination 3. Attention
Computers & networks have made production & dissemination easy. The bottleneck is now capturing the audience's attention.
Generative AI increases 1, but not 2 nor 3.
